title: PFC pays Rs 2,033 crore interim dividend to Govt for FY24
description: PFC paid ₹2,033 crore dividend to the government for FY23-24 in three instalments. Highest-ever interim dividend presented to RK Singh. Total interim dividends of ₹3,630 crore distributed. PTI reported the record dividend payments.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
